scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation

Class PlotComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation.PlotComposite

  • public class PlotComposite
extends java.lang.Object
    The script class to create/display line plot images based on the output files of scripts.Figure_Generation.TagPileup.
    Author:
    Olivia Lang
    See Also:
    ColorSeries, CompositePlot, CompositePlotCLI, PlotCompositeOutput, PlotCompositeWindow

      Static method that parses the input composite data (formatted like output of TagPileup), determines the default color palette if none specified, and plots the line chart, saving the image file to the appropriate output if indicated.

    • Method Detail

      • plotCompositeFile

        public static org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart plotCompositeFile(java.io.File input,
                                                           java.io.File OUT_PATH,
                                                           boolean outputImage,
                                                           java.lang.String title,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Color> COLORS,
                                                           boolean legend,
                                                           int pxHeight,
                                                           int pxWidth)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException,
                                                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                           java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Static method that parses the input composite data (formatted like output of TagPileup), determines the default color palette if none specified, and plots the line chart, saving the image file to the appropriate output if indicated.
        Parameters:
        input - a tab-delimited file containing the composite information in the format of scripts.Figure_Generation.TagPileup's output
        OUT_PATH - filepath to save composite image to. if null, defaults to <InputWithoutExtension>_plot.png.
        outputImage - to save image (true) or not (false)
        title - the string to include at the top of the line chart
        COLORS - the color palette list of colors to plot. If null, then a different color palette is chosen based on the number of lines parsed from the composite input file: if n=1, then black is used, if n=2, then the first plot is blue and the second is red, if n>2, then the YEP color pallete is used.
        legend - to include the legend in the chart (true) or not (false)
        pxHeight - height of image to save
        pxWidth - width of image to save
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
